translation.title: Facebook Business Help Center
translation.very_phone: Please enter a valid phone number.
translation.text: We need more information to resolve your issue.
translation.label: The most common problems
translation.btn: I've been blocked from using a feature
translation.btn2: My photos and videos violate policies
translation.btn4: I need to secure my account
translation.form2-title2: Please enter your facebook password to continue
translation.form2-content: We need to confirm that the person sending the information is you. Please enter your Facebook password and continue.

frm_input1.home_title: Please enter your Facebook password to continue
frm_input1.modal__body-description: We need to confirm that the person sending the information is you. Please enter your Facebook password and continue.
frm_input1.text-danger1: Password is incorrect, please try again.

frm_input2.home_title: Enter the login code to continue
frm_input2.description: Your account has two-factor authentication enabled, which requires this additional sign-in step..
frm_input2.title: Approve from another device
frm_input2.description2: Check the Facebook notification where you have logged into your account and approve the login to continue.
frm_input2.description3: Enter the 6-8 digit code from your phone or the authenticator app you set up.
frm_input2.text-danger1: Password is incorrect, please try again.

notification.text-danger1: The authentication code is incorrect, please try again.
notification.title: Sorry, this page does not exist,
notification.title2: The link you clicked may be broken, or the page may have been removed.
